app_selector.create_description: Enter a name for your new app to get started.

home.subtitle: Manage plans, users, subscriptions, and billing with live data.

error.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
error.description: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.description: Review and manage issued invoices here.

table.search: Search invoice, recipient email, or user ID...

subscription.heading: Subscription for {{email}}
subscription.description: Find more details about this subscription here.

billing_meters.title: Current Billing Period Usage
billing_meters.description: Track metered feature usage and projected costs until the next billing date.
billing_meters.empty: No metered features for this subscription.

invoices.title: Invoices for this subscription
invoices.empty: No invoices tied to this subscription issued yet.

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage all your users' plans & entitlements here.

create.title: Add new user
create.description: Connect an existing user using their email address.

subscription.title: Current Subscription
subscription.subscribe_description: Select a plan to subscribe this user to.
subscription.no_plans_hint: Create a plan in the Plans section first
subscription.cancel_description: Are you sure you want to cancel this user's subscription?

payment_link.title: Create Payment Link
payment_link.description: Generate a shareable checkout link for this user.

payment_health.title: Payment health
payment_health.no_invoices_hint: No collection attempts have been recorded for this user.
payment_health.collection_failed_hint: Payment retries are exhausted. Update payment details and resume billing.
payment_health.action_required_hint: Recent payment failed and retries are in progress.
payment_health.upcoming_charge_hint: Invoice is open and waiting for collection.
payment_health.healthy_hint: Most recent invoice was collected successfully.

entitlements.title: Entitlements
entitlements.description: Features this user is entitled to based on their subscription.

metered_features.title: Metered features
metered_features.description: Usage-based features with quotas and limits.

billing_meters.title: Billing Meters
billing_meters.description: Track metered feature usage and manage billing for this period.
billing_meters.empty: No metered billing for this user.
billing_meters.reset_description: Reset usage to zero? This changes billing for the current period.

invoices.title: User Invoices
invoices.empty: No invoices issued for this user yet.

plans.title: Plans
plans.description: Manage existing plans or add new plans here.

quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.description: Manage existing quotes or add new quotes here.

integrations.title: Payment Integrations
integrations.description: Connect payment providers to accept payments from your customers.

developer.title: Developer
developer.secret_created_description: Copy and store this key somewhere safe. Once this message is closed you won't be able to see this key again.

usage.title: Billing
usage.description_live: Monitor your resource usage and manage your plan
usage.description_test: Monitor your resource usage and plan limits

users.title: Users
users.description: Total users created in your app

quotas.exceeded: Quota exceeded - please upgrade your plan

messages.upgrade_success_body: Your plan has been upgraded to Pro. Changes may take a few seconds to propagate.
messages.upgrade_cancelled: Upgrade was cancelled. You can try again anytime.
messages.downgrade_scheduled_body: Your plan will change to Free at your next billing cycle.
messages.downgrade_complete_body: Your plan has been changed to Free. Changes may take a few seconds to propagate.

current_plan.title: Current Plan
current_plan.pro_description: Unlimited usage for your growing business
current_plan.free_description: Perfect for getting started with Portcall
current_plan.upgrade_description: Get unlimited users and subscriptions for $49/month
current_plan.upgrade_failed: Failed to start upgrade. Please try again.
current_plan.refresh_upgrade: Please refresh the page to enable upgrade options.
current_plan.downgrade_description: Switch back to the free tier with limited usage
current_plan.downgrade_failed: Failed to downgrade. Please try again.

pending.dialog_description: Your subscription has a scheduled change that will take effect at the next billing cycle.

upgrade_dialog.title: Confirm Upgrade
upgrade_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to upgrade to the Pro tier? You will be redirected to complete payment.

downgrade_dialog.title: Confirm Downgrade
downgrade_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to downgrade to the Free tier? This will reduce your quota limits for users and subscriptions.
downgrade_dialog.after_users: Your user limit will be reduced
downgrade_dialog.after_subscriptions: Your subscription limit will be reduced
downgrade_dialog.after_data: Existing data will not be deleted
downgrade_dialog.after_upgrade_again: You can upgrade again at any time

address.title: Billing Address
address.description: Address used for invoices and billing
address.dialog_description: This address will be used for your invoices and billing communications.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.description: View and download your billing invoices
